snippet: Dr. Kermit Gosnell waived his right to appeal three murder convictions related to failed abortions at his Philadelphia clinic.
abstract: Dr Kermit Gosnell, convicted of murdering babies after failed abortions in Philadelphia clinic, avoids death penalty by agreeing to sentence of life in prison without parole.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Kermit Gosnell waived his right to appeal three murder convictions related to failed abortions at his Philadelphia clinic.

headline.seo: Doctor Avoids Death Penalty in Murders at Clinic
headline.main: Doctor Avoids Death Penalty in Murders at His Clinic
headline.print_headline: Doctor Avoids Death Penalty In Murders At His Clinic
